mapper.sql: stockIn.id as id , stockIn.voucher_num as voucherNum , stockIn.voucher_type as voucherType , stockIn.out_unit_id as outUnitId , stockIn.out_unit as outUnit , stockIn.out_stock_ground_id as outStockGroundId , stockIn.out_stock_ground as outStockGround , stockIn.in_unit_id as inUnitId , stockIn.in_unit as inUnit , stockIn.in_stock_ground_id as inStockGroundId , stockIn.in_stock_ground as inStockGround , stockIn.goods_nums as goodsNums , stockIn.goods_amount as goodsAmount , stockIn.goods_sorts as goodsSorts , stockIn.directly_org_id as directlyOrgId , stockIn.hierarchy_id as hierarchyId , stockIn.is_delete as isDelete , stockIn.creator_id as creatorId , stockIn.create_time as createTime , stockIn.updator_id as updatorId , stockIn.update_time as updateTime , stockIn.remark1 as remark1 , stockIn.remark2 as remark2
mapper.insert:
insert into stock_in_tb
id,
voucher_num,
voucher_type,
out_unit_id,
out_unit,
out_stock_ground_id,
out_stock_ground,

goods_sorts,
directly_org_id,
hierarchy_id,
is_delete,

create_time,
updator_id,
update_time,
remark1,
remark2,

#{voucherNum},

#{outUnitId},
#{outUnit},

mapper.update:
update stock_in_tb
voucher_num = #{voucherNum},
voucher_type = #{voucherType},
out_unit_id = #{outUnitId},
out_unit = #{outUnit},
out_stock_ground_id = #{outStockGroundId},
out_stock_ground = #{outStockGround},
in_unit_id = #{inUnitId},
in_unit = #{inUnit},
in_stock_ground_id = #{inStockGroundId},
in_stock_ground = #{inStockGround},
goods_nums = #{goodsNums},
goods_amount = #{goodsAmount},
goods_sorts = #{goodsSorts},
directly_org_id = #{directlyOrgId},
hierarchy_id = #{hierarchyId},
is_delete = #{isDelete},
creator_id = #{creatorId},
create_time = #{createTime},
updator_id = #{updatorId},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark1 = #{remark1},
remark2 = #{remark2},
where id = #{id}
